Posts.Content: What is your job?  I can understand the worry of not earning, can you get any support x
Posts.Title: Being fit and well is such a long way off

Posts.Content: This whole work thing is a bit daunting, I can't claim anything I earn just slightly too much, feel under pressure to rush back xxx
Posts.Title: Being fit and well is such a long way off

Posts.Content: Good on you jojo Don't look back and think it was a rubbish Christmas, you know how I worry, I know you do too but we can't change what is to be, I wish we could xxx Get your make up on dress nice hug your boys and enjoy this lovely time of year with them. Just about to lose battery but will speak later xxx
Posts.Title: New day, new attitude

Posts.Content: Hi i had my op 30 nov i too had swelling, that lead to infection which lead to tons of antibiotics and admitted to hossi new yr eve as it burst through, I am still leaking now, possibly delaying. radiotherapy but no swelling or pain now, have you started radiotherapy with this?  I struggle to get the same answers twice off docs and nurses
Posts.Title: Axillary clearance post surgery swelling or lymphodema?

Posts.Content: Sorry sausage fingers, should say your boss x
Posts.Title: SO IT TOOK ME A YEAR......BUT

Posts.Content: Oh ronstar, what a pain for you, I am a right clumsy bugger, how did you manage that.is it a clean break xxxx heal fast
Posts.Title: Just so fed up - will it ever end?

Posts.Content: London sounds like a big day yesterday,my our boss sounds lovely. intalk lots lol, I work in the community too and live in a smallish community. from the minute my nearest and dearest knew I put it on a page on social media for the world to see, it's how I deal with it.but its a great source of help and support for me too. we are all indeed very different but I agree,Mali about it get it out there, I want to know what I'm facing, from the people living with it. this place is full of tips advice support from people who have walked this road before me. i agree, I hate the head tilt etc but I get that people don't know what to say or do,miso I help them along lol I tell them it's shit scary messing with my head but we Laugh too . if one person reads my page and then comes in behind me I hope they will know it's all normal feelings, it's also meant I hooked up with others pages and am learning so much. it really sounds ridiculously tough on you but look at you reclaiming your life, your inspiring for others.its not all hearts and flowers and stay strong b brave,miss crap ....but yes it does change us in positive ways too, enjoy your lazy weekend, I'm still laying in bed xxxx
Posts.Title: SO IT TOOK ME A YEAR......BUT

Posts.Content: as you may know I had an infection in my sentinel node scar and got admitted at christmas it is still leaking, the back end of the scar is kind of sticking out, like it needs poking back in to heal. i am due back to bc nurse tomorrow to get it checked. anyhow I have been desperately trying to get hold of r1 and r2 cream for use with radiotherapy, it's due to start next wednesday i was telling doc about scar and he says oooo I don't think you will be getting radiotherapy next week oh and we can't do the cream either i am seriously fed up, I have a three hour round trip for radiotherapy and have brivers in place o take me so I can be there and back with minimal disruption to my kids,I just feel so bloody sick of fighting to get everything in place, it doesn't help that I am peak of divorce having to sort mortgage etc all out on my own, dad is due more ops and being very demanding and I am just genrally knackered. i just want to get on and try and get some kind of life back, they have said hike it's leakingi. Still can't drive and living in the lakes is bloody difficult not driving  just fed up of battling for every little thing. i know I can buy the cream but seriously having cancer is costing a small fortune and I am desperately trying not to go sick.
Posts.Title: Bloody doctor

Posts.Content: Yes snowy your right I might have to make him help x hes worse than useless he just walked away til I got the cancer dx then I made him come back london your right I do feel in a Rut im just worried it will grow back while I am delayed really. i am so scared it's growing right now and I know that's probably silly but none the less it is what it is, I am positive mostly but I. Can't shake it off. tamoxifen doesn't seem to be causing too many issues though, I have a bit of a sore throats and I am a bit warm at night but manageable x
Posts.Title: Bloody doctor

Posts.Content: Hi snowy yes Preston but I need to get there and back asap I need to see my son off to school and be there for his return and hospital transport can take longer. he has mild SEN in his last yr at school will be mid mocks and is very anxious so I am trying to be there for him as much as I possibly can x
Posts.Title: Bloody doctor

Posts.Content: Hi Chatting on someone's facebook page and there's a bit of chat about tamoxifen and weight gain, can I hear your stories please. I'm already a chubby bugger
Posts.Title: Tamoxifen and weight gain

Posts.Content: lol, lol we were having a giggle about it, I think they are working, hopefully see breast guy and get home today, missing my dog terribly x
Posts.Title: Tamoxifen and weight gain

Posts.Content: Thanks for the replies ladies really interesting how we are all different, suzie I will keep an eye on bad dreams, someone here recommended taking it as night as they found hot flushes better, I am currently only three days in and been taking at 8pm I am also taking vit d3 in the morning and peppermint tea morning and night, so far I think I might have had a very mild hot flush last night about ten seconds but the hossi was that hot anyway it could be anything
Posts.Title: Tamoxifen and weight gain

Posts.Content: Thanks I have taken three so far,lol so needs time to get into my system, I lost just under stained since dx as it's just stress I guess and a million antibiotics for my infection. I have had no side effects so far but I would imagine it takes a while to get into your system x
Posts.Title: Tamoxifen and weight gain

Posts.Content: Well London , tomorrow is today xxx thinking of you
Posts.Title: Now I know.....

Posts.Content: Go London, you have helped me loads, your an inspiration xxxx
Posts.Title: Now I know.....

Posts.Content: Glad your sorted but what an arse your doctor is.grrrrrr My daughter had her tonsils out same week as I had surgery and I rang for her sick note and they posted it out, what a jobs worth your doctor sounds,shame on him
Posts.Title: Angry over sick note

Posts.Content: Brilliant news.xxxx
Posts.Title: The neoadjuvant chemo is working.

Posts.Content: Hi I have been on tamoxifen for six weeks, apart from some hot flushes no real symptoms, long may that continue x
Posts.Title: TAMOXIFEN - HONEST OPINIONS PLEASE

Posts.Content: Well done jane for coming so far, I'm no where near your milestone and a newly single parent with teens. i have lots of support of friends colleagues neighbours but on a daily basis not a lot of practical support. i think ultimatltey we all face this alone, don't always share our true feelings for fear of upsetting others etc. it also seems for many once treatment is done we are expected to carry on as before as if we just had a cold or something. can you speak to your hubbie. could you mark the day with a nice family meal or something?
Posts.Title: Feeling strange 1 year after chemo

Posts.Content: Hi Jane I am on a local support group and a lady there was saying chemo had damaged her teeth, there might be truth there, have you used any councilling?  I never believed in it but I am going to try it
Posts.Title: Feeling strange 1 year after chemo

Posts.Content: Hi just little I had this on 30th Nov I didn't go blue, I had blue loo type week for 2/3 days. I have full movement and was back driving after a week, virtually no pain, just a bit tired after the op. I haven't had any time off work but have worked from home a few days....just cos of the driving issue. I have a small but very neat scar under arm and one on breast from lumpectomy. They also put a guide wire in, that was painless too but the injection to numb was a little uncomfortable but not too bad. Good luck, loads of advice here.it was much easier than I expected it to be, they took five nodes in the end, I get my results on Wednesday ....waiting is the hardest bit xxxx
Posts.Title: After sentinel lymph node biopsy

Posts.Content: I got some from Royce, a bit pricey but nice x www.royce-lingerie.co.uk/non-wired-mastectomy-bras
Posts.Title: Bras again!

Posts.Content: Oh London,that made my eyes leak, you have been brilliant with your support. I agree get it on paper so you remember when you go in. What is the cause of the pain, your mood is bound to be low if your in pain so I would imagine sorting pain is a priority, have you tried holistic stuff for your mood? You can't carry on like this, you need some rest,I'm so sorry she's not listening, I would also try a different Gp Do you have a cancer nurse who could help and can you take someone with you. Have you told anyone in the real world how hard it is xxx I'm sending you a virtual hug,you have been so helpful e someone can help you now
Posts.Title: How to make GP understand that I'm struggling?

Posts.Content: Good luck London, don't be robbed off, I agree get pain under control and you will feel stronger to deal with the rest. Get her to listen now so you can get something sorted for the festive season.xxx Take care
Posts.Title: How to make GP understand that I'm struggling?

Posts.Content: Glad to have you back xxx
Posts.Title: THANKYOU SO MUCH

Posts.Content: Oh wombat xxxx Could the pain be stress related or the way you are holding yourself?  Ask today when you go in. My hubbie left in April, we would have been together 25 yr on Christmas Eve. He's been useless, I'm glad he's not here as it's like having another child to sort out. I do realise this is hard on others around us though but yes I think unless your living it you just don't get it xxx
Posts.Title: upper back pain

Posts.Content: Oh jolly what a time of it you've had.glad your getting the support, hope you manage to feel a bit brighter soon x
Posts.Title: failed deep flap

Posts.Content: Hi  I finished Tuesday, I am using r1 -and r2 cream, just r2 now three four times a day, I was told to stop if skin breaks. i would give your b.c. Nurse a call or the radiotherapy department, I am airing mine as much as poss too lol
Posts.Title: Skin care following completion of radiotherapy

Posts.Content: I went for routine mammogram on 25th oct, I am 47 Got results two weeks later, it was a call back I went back biopsy done on 15th Nov Results 22nov invasive ducal stage one lymph nodes look clear 15 mm tumor oestrogen receptive I went Friday for pre op to design consent form and meet surgeon,all very matter of fact He can't feel it  I go tomorrow for some dye injected apparently it takes two hours Then Wednesday for lumpectomy...I can't remember if they take away nodes then?  I am at work today and tomorrow morning, I also have meetings booked at end of week, only short ones.... I am extremely scared and anxious which is unlike me I am feeling completely out of control now, like I haven't asked enough or the right questions. Does it hurt,has it grown is it growing quickly what if it's in nodes  When will her2 be back,what will radiotherapy be like, will I be able to work through God a bloody million questions come into my head  I know I need to make a list,it's all so quick and I want it to be but I am mid divorce which is stressful enough I am helping care for my dad who's had his nose cheek off and is so blind dot selfish it's unreal, I just feel completely overwhelmed I'm not sleeping waking up in panics,crying randomly...it's just hell I put a real front on at home as the kids are just shattered with it all but how on earth will I cope. I do have lovely lovely friends and have joined two local support groups on facenook but locked myself out of my acc for 24 hrs and can't ask there now. I just want to run away
Posts.Title: Have I missed anything?

Posts.Content: @jojo4  I'm locked out of messenger for 24 hrs lol I just don't think I have listened well enough If I have the dye in tomorrow can they then tell if it's in the nodes by the time I have surgery?  If so what's the two week wait for after surgery Also they have said nothing about reconstruction, maybe cos the lump isn't large... I will make a list.... going to pack bag for Wednesday then have a bath, I'm completely frazzled today Thank you all
Posts.Title: Have I missed anything?

Posts.Content: @jojo4  I'm locked out of messenger for 24 hrs lol I just don't think I have listened well enough If I have the dye in tomorrow can they then tell if it's in the nodes by the time I have surgery?  If so what's the two week wait for after surgery Also they have said nothing about reconstruction, maybe cos the lump isn't large... I will make a list.... going to pack bag for Wednesday then have a bath, I'm completely frazzled today Thank you all
Posts.Title: Have I missed anything?

Posts.Content: X yes that makes sense jojo Thanks Jeeeez it's only been a flaming week since do, I'm going to be grey overnight
Posts.Title: Have I missed anything?

Posts.Content: Has anyone made major or minor changes to diet?  I.e. Given up dairy Given up alcohol Changed to organic Given up red meat Gone veggie or vegan There is so much info out there it's hard to sort the good advice from the naff advice
Posts.Title: Changes to diet

Posts.Content: Thanks Julia and Carolyn good sound advice, I've never really thought about it much even though I used to diet fiercely in my younger day Your right, I want to feed my body quality, I always batch cook these days for ease with work etc I also need to budget well too though Any good value ideas would be good too, maybe we could get a list of ideas x Off to re educate my Asda shop
Posts.Title: Changes to diet

Posts.Content: @spudzmum I have to be strong for the kids it's so hard for them Their dad is just not making contact, I know they must be very scared right now I'm not googling at all It's just so fast, life has changed beyond recognition, I have to keep working as we're on our own now
Posts.Title: Have I missed anything?

Posts.Content: Yes crystal my best friend in the whole world is coming and she's super sensible and organised. her strength is amazing thank you for explaining it i have just shouted at my teen son, his room is a pigsty and I'm running round trying to get everything in place im off for a bath and a good cry xxx
Posts.Title: Have I missed anything?

Posts.Content: @spudzmum I have to be strong for the kids it's so hard for them Their dad is just not making contact, I know they must be very scared right now I'm not googling at all It's just so fast, life has changed beyond recognition, I have to keep working as we're on our own now
Posts.Title: Have I missed anything?

Posts.Content: @crystaljuju Thanks I know your right, and yes frantic is exactly what I am, it was bad enough juggling life before this, now it's just completely mad. I have lots of offers I'm just used to being the one helping not asking for help It's been a really rough day today and I feel so unprepared
Posts.Title: Have I missed anything?

Posts.Content: Yes crystal my best friend in the whole world is coming and she's super sensible and organised. her strength is amazing thank you for explaining it i have just shouted at my teen son, his room is a pigsty and I'm running round trying to get everything in place im off for a bath and a good cry xxx
Posts.Title: Have I missed anything?

Posts.Content: London, I am sorry today was pants.your such a great support to everyone and full of wise words its good to hear your human too, you cope brilliantly we all have bad days, take care of yourself, be kind to yourself xxxxx
Posts.Title: Have to be honest.....

Posts.Content: @crystaljuju Thanks I know your right, and yes frantic is exactly what I am, it was bad enough juggling life before this, now it's just completely mad. I have lots of offers I'm just used to being the one helping not asking for help It's been a really rough day today and I feel so unprepared
Posts.Title: Have I missed anything?

Posts.Content: X yes that makes sense jojo Thanks Jeeeez it's only been a flaming week since do, I'm going to be grey overnight

Does it hurt,has it grown is it growing quickly what if it's in nodes  When will her2 be back,what will radiotherapy be like, will I be able to work through God a bloody million questions come into my head  I know I need to make a list,it's all so quick and I want it to be but I am mid divorce which is stressful enough I am helping care for my dad who's had his nose cheek off and is so blind dot selfish it's unreal, I just feel completely overwhelmed I'm not sleeping waking up in panics,crying randomly...it's just hell I put a real front on at home as the kids are just shattered with it all but how on earth will I cope. Posts.Title: Have I missed anything?

Posts.Content: Your doing really great jo x
Posts.Title: What a day...Marker Clip Insertion

Posts.Content: Dgreat news really pleased for you xxx
Posts.Title: So worried - 2 new lumps in my other breast

Posts.Content: Hi Jen I hope you got some sleep, where you are now is a very scary place, the waiting is torture. I can remember the feelings all too well and as a single parent worrying about the kids. Nothing you do ATM can speed things up. Keep busy keep normal, if it is cancer breast cancer is very survivable these days,that's all I kept telling myself. Keep talking, nights really are the hardest x
Posts.Title: Lump in my armpit.

Posts.Content: Jojo I totally get that in every way I too am hanging on for dear life,awake half the night certain I can feel it growing. I am a community manager for the leisure centres in Cumbria, I live in a little town and know everyone. It's my job to work with communities so very public als working a lot with councils. My hubbie left in April he was busted with an affair my dad alshad his nose roof of mouth and cheek removed with cancer in April.my hubbie has no contact with me or the kids even though he knows what we are going through Please feel free to off load, I went public on the lovely Facebook as I do not want this to define me and I don't want to live and breath cancer convos every day.....the response has been overwhelming to be honest and very comforting, please keep talking I am finding it's really helping,but we are all different do what's right for you xxx
Posts.Title: 2nd night of waiting: even more terrified

Posts.Content: Hi this is new to me, I speak with my consultant today, just wanted to wish you well today, I know what you mean about going from 100mph to here xxx
Posts.Title: Here goes...first day of chemo

Posts.Content: Awww Jojo I got my results Tuesday the waiting is strangely the worst bit, I have just gone public on Facebook,I have a very public job in my community, the support has been a bit overwhelming. You have already found here and are gathering info.hang in there xxxx
Posts.Title: 2nd night of waiting: even more terrified

Posts.Content: Carolyn28 I found that really useful too, easy to understand, thank you x
Posts.Title: 2nd night of waiting: even more terrified

Posts.Content: Zaria I love your signature quote, please can I use it on my Facebook page xxxxx
Posts.Title: 2nd night of waiting: even more terrified

Posts.Content: Oh London, that's made my eyes leak,even though I am an adult and told my dx is good I am still utterly terrified I am going to die sooner rather than later so I can see where kids get it from, my dad has cancer but really I have barely been touched by cancer before my dx, and even now I still have rabbit in headlights moments, usually when I am alone at night. i think it's a wonderful thing to look at going into school an absolutely brilliant idea. you really inspire me so I am sure you would be fantastic at talking to the children xxx im glad your niece spoke to you
Posts.Title: Today......

Posts.Content: Get the booster early or late ? Ask your vets advice re if he has it early Get a second opinion from another vet re live or not 4paws I know how much my dog means to me so I know this is a big deal for you, I had to be in hossi away from mine for three days,so depressing ❤️
Posts.Title: Chemotherapy and my dog

Posts.Content: Tray41 bloody well done and thanks for a positive post, I love to read about people coming through, I'm at the other end, sorry your bad with your chest, hope that clears fast x
Posts.Title: Another box ticked

Posts.Content: Bloody hell carolyn .... no need to be greedy.... cor didn't know that ❤️❤️❤️
Posts.Title: Diagnosed with 2 types of breast cancer

Posts.Content: That's wonderful, something for you to focus on. i have found kindness like I have never known through all this. it really restores your faith
Posts.Title: I am blessed!!!

Posts.Content: Morning, can I ask is it normal to have an egg size lump around the lymph scar under the arm? It's 10 days since op, not noticed it before but not really touched it much either.i have full arm movement.thanks
Posts.Title: Lump under arm after op

Posts.Content: Yes it has no personal details on,I am just having a crap afternoon,I had a super good morning though. my dad has cancer too, I went to visit and he just brings me down,it's not his fault then my sis rang and is all doom and gloom, I am home alone and just feeling a bit sad this aft really. mostly I am on it compared to back when I got dx but this aft I am ot. thisi s exactly why I keep busy usually to stop all this rubbish in my head. yes a nice cup of tea, I am honestly too scared to even have a sip of wine or whatever since the infection, that's what knocked me more than anything,it just made me think it would make cancer spread and really knocked my confidence. even though it was under arm and I had no nodes involved  early night tonight and tomorrow will be another day xxx
Posts.Title: Silly worries? How do you sort your head out

Posts.Content: Thanks, the hospital I go to is a two hour round trip, we do have a local host pita though, maybe I will call my doctor?
Posts.Title: Lump under arm after op

Posts.Content: Thanks snowy mum  I don't know if I will feel more scared not going everyday xxx
Posts.Title: Silly worries? How do you sort your head out

Posts.Content: Hi all all I am going to have to get things off my chest, no pun intended.i feel so confused with info and am just having a bad few hours worrying myself silly,it's cos the house is empty of the kids and I am too tired to get busy. i have attached my dx.i think it's a positive one as far as positives go but the infection I had really really knocked me, I now can't stop  spread, I have cancer else where, every ache pain etc is bad bad news. i say can't stop most of the time I am fin and positive and I have good online support and real world friends but this just keeps pecking my head.chemo was not offered it was wle and radiotherapy I know I dodged a bullet there but how on earth do you ever get your head right  I have 7 radiotherapy sessions left then it's just me and the tamoxifenI am mostly a sane sensible reasonably educated hard working together person but some days/hours I'm just floored.being mid divorce doesn't help but I just need to give my head a wobble at times,I'm writing it here so I can get it out and get some perspective. im actually annoying myself letting it in.
Posts.Title: Silly worries? How do you sort your head out

Posts.Content: Thanks london, that's me always rushing ahead.....I do feel scared I also feel like, "shit what just happened" from dx to finishing radiotherapy is just around two and a half months and I just don't feel I have caught my breath, I feel a bit like how am I supposed to deal with this, it's so fast. which obviously I am glad of and glad of the early screening that picked it up, I had no symptoms, there I was bobbing along then boom, the cancer train got me and deposited me off a few weeks later, I know I am lucky by comparison it's just like I am in a bad dream occasionally xxxx  i cant ever see me settling again so yes I guess it is about finding a new way to live  wise words as always
Posts.Title: Silly worries? How do you sort your head out

Posts.Content: Good for you, you deserve a treat x
Posts.Title: Two weeks since final chemo ...

Posts.Content: [edit - image removed] Hi all all I am going to have to get things off my chest, no pun intended.i feel so confused with info and am just having a bad few hours worrying myself silly,it's cos the house is empty of the kids and I am too tired to get busy. i have attached my dx.i think it's a positive one as far as positives go but the infection I had really really knocked me, I now can't stop  spread, I have cancer else where, every ache pain etc is bad bad news. i say can't stop most of the time I am fin and positive and I have good online support and real world friends but this just keeps pecking my head.chemo was not offered it was wle and radiotherapy I know I dodged a bullet there but how on earth do you ever get your head right  I have 7 radiotherapy sessions left then it's just me and the tamoxifenI am mostly a sane sensible reasonably educated hard working together person but some days/hours I'm just floored.being mid divorce doesn't help but I just need to give my head a wobble at times,I'm writing it here so I can get it out and get some perspective. im actually annoying myself letting it in.
Posts.Title: Silly worries? How do you sort your head out

Posts.Content: Sorry, couldn't figure it out
Posts.Title: Silly worries? How do you sort your head out

Posts.Content: Julia thank you, unfortunately my sister is a negative nancy and would be so grumpy if I spoke out and I just don't have the energy to argue, my dad is the same, my brother is fabulous always positive,we get on like a house on fire  I will bounce back I know, I think I missed everyone today the house was so quiet and I had a busy morning so was too tired to be bothered, I felt like I was just sat wallowing in self pity and that's so not me. i am a doer and a busy bee I hate resting really really hate it. i will get there, it's so helpful to come here or with my on line friends and get it off my chest I just can't speak like this in the real world xxx
Posts.Title: Silly worries? How do you sort your head out

Posts.Content: I had my op 30 th nov my npple didn't go blue for a while after, the blue dye in my wee only lasted a day or so,didn't notice it in eyes at all x my nipple is still Blhe, I have had a lot of issues with infection in node scar though and lost a lot of fluids so not sure if that alters things x
Posts.Title: Tell me about your scars

Posts.Content: Hi I'm not worried massively as doc said he wasn't My scar is on the top of my inner left breast and three weeks old.its from a WLE under the skin going off in kind of a short line is a lumpy bit. It's not painful as such but is really sore He said it was like a blood clot which scared me but he said not to worry it would go I also have fluid under my arm but he said that would go too The breast scar is very tender and lumpy too Any advice?  Going to take arnica but anything else I should do?  Thanks
Posts.Title: Tell me about your scars

Posts.Content: Thanks, yes I am stopping driving over Christmas  I always want to run before I can walk..... Massage towards good blood, top tip I am using e 45 but will get bio oil Thanks x
Posts.Title: Tell me about your scars

Posts.Content: I haven't started it yet, going to wait til new year but I saw oncologist today and I asked about what if you forgot etc, she said that was fine and just take again next day, don't double dose How are you finding it Hope your better soon x
Posts.Title: Sickness bug / Tamoxifen

Posts.Content: My neck of the woods, she's bloody awesome
Posts.Title: A truly inspirational film - must see

Posts.Content: Congratulations, I guess it will never really be over for any of us, I will be done in a week, I didn't have chemo so from first mammogram to finish three and a half months, part of me thinks "shit what just happened". i am nervous to finish as I would think you are too but for now enjoy the spring coming and go live xxxx
Posts.Title: I've finished all of the treatment!

Posts.Content: Brilliant that's great news, I hope so too,my boss just text me to see how I was I offered to put hols in til next Monday, he just said work from home It makes such a difference to have a great boss, I really hope this is your perfect job x
Posts.Title: Looking Positive :)

Posts.Content: Helen I literally begged for r1 r2 avail, in the end someone kindly gifted me some and I bought additional I am so glad I found out about it, expensive but worth it x
Posts.Title: Radiotherapy burns & blisters

Posts.Content: I would discuss with your oncologist  what about trying something holistic too, maybe acupuncture massage mindfullness i know it sounds a bit odd but just thinking how much more mess you could take? Xxx hope you get sorted glad your loving the job
Posts.Title: Advice on Pain Relief...

Posts.Content: Well done on finishing, I finished 15 a week ago,used r1/r2 throughout with no burns but I wore a bra Sunday and it rubbed my nipple which is sore enough,I am like you large breasted and also air my boob lol ...I think that really really helps.i was told to put nothing on if skin broke but touch wood it hasn't.my dad uses the mepilex they are lovely gentle dressings. hope it's better soon
Posts.Title: Radiotherapy burns & blisters

Posts.Content: Kit Kat I am still going braless as it rubs but I drape a scarf round me so it's a bit more discreet xx then put baggy clothes on too xxx How is it today
Posts.Title: Radiotherapy burns & blisters

Posts.Content: Helen I literally begged for r1 r2 avail, in the end someone kindly gifted me some and I bought additional I am so glad I found out about it, expensive but worth it x
Posts.Title: Radiotherapy burns & blisters

Posts.Content: Kit Kat I am still going braless as it rubs but I drape a scarf round me so it's a bit more discreet xx then put baggy clothes on too xxx How is it today
Posts.Title: Radiotherapy burns & blisters

Posts.Content: Well done on finishing, I finished 15 a week ago,used r1/r2 throughout with no burns but I wore a bra Sunday and it rubbed my nipple which is sore enough,I am like you large breasted and also air my boob lol ...I think that really really helps.i was told to put nothing on if skin broke but touch wood it hasn't.my dad uses the mepilex they are lovely gentle dressings. hope it's better soon
Posts.Title: Radiotherapy burns & blisters

Posts.Content: (((()))) yes dislike x
Posts.Title: Just when I was trying to get back to normal

Posts.Content: Hi Not been on in ages, finished treatment way back in FEB and have been on tamoxifen seven months it's going ok, worry worms are an issue time to time but I'm doing ok. I noticed some changes to the underside of my breast in may, it has also shrunk a bit. Non of this is near my scar which is top of breast, my skin looks like rippled sand and my nipple is so dry and sensitive, the whole area itches too, I have had a mammogram and ultrasound both clear but wonder if anyone else has had this, the skin feels thicker and lumpy too x I have pics but can't figure out how to attach them
Posts.Title: Skin changes months after radiotherapy

Posts.Content: Think I might have cracked it, thevraised skin is from the nipple outwards
Posts.Title: Skin changes months after radiotherapy

Posts.Content: Hi optimistic, that person sounds like a bundle of joy. I know it's not all going to be a bad of roses but how information is delivered is so important to your mental state isn't it. Glad your bc nurse got your nose issue sorted quick. I suppose we can all get cancer again but we could get something else or be run over by a bus, it's the unknown isn't it xxxx Do you have any local cancer support?

Posts.Content: I am rubbish with words but this makes me so sad, yes this illness is absolute shite but please don't hate yourself, others have said it all but your family will want you not money, money is worth nothing at the end of the day ❤️

Posts.Content: Happy Christmas to everyone, and thank you for picking me up, helping me out or just being here with kind words. To be here where people get it is invaluable xxx
Posts.Title: Merry Christmas Everyone :)

Posts.Content: I'm following with interest,I am 47 I hadnt had a period for about 8 months but I can't remember, I was dx in Nov  er positive HER2 neg not started rads yet but I was given tamoxifen i have only been on it a week  I wonder if I am on the right drug, I have questioned it thry have not done blood tests to check where I am with menopause
Posts.Title: Choice of medication?

Posts.Content: That is fantastic news I am so pleased for you
Posts.Title: More shrinkage on 'T' chemo.

Posts.Content: EJM60 What a relief for you - we must be at the same stage - I had my results last Friday - clear margins and negative nodes but some individual tumour cells in the node capsule. Seeing the oncologist to discuss this on Thursday.   Bet you'll have more sleep tonight! Jane Yes Jane I hope so, I see oncologist Friday  What's your plans next for treatment x
Posts.Title: I have my results

Posts.Content: My results are in The journey begins Surgery is done, bit of swelling and small blood clot but they are not worried Grade one no nodes involved Clear margins Got to see oncologist Friday then radiotherapy and ten yr hormone therapy It's the best possible news xxx Got to stop driving as much as it's stopping the healing but it's Christmas now Bloody party time xxxx I honestly feel like I have been given a second chance at life xxx I will not be wasting it. Thank you for being here in my darkest hours x
Posts.Title: I have my results

Posts.Content: So pleased you can stop ' worrying!' That was great news you had today.......as you say, you now have a good future ahead and I suspect after the fears of the last few weeks, you won't waste it. My oncologist told me grade one is almost always totally treatable. ( Unfortunately when the analysis came back, I didn't have that) I'm sorry Karen x I am going to take this opportunity to do some more good with my life xxx
Posts.Title: I have my results

Posts.Content: Fabulous fabulous news.....I knew you would be alright.  Last night I wanted to say I would eat hay with a donkey if it was in your nodes but I didn't want to jinx things. I am over the moon chuffed for you lol Helen , it's been such a long time since anything good happened in my life, I dared not hope. Are you from up north, I'm proper chuffed too x
Posts.Title: I have my results

Posts.Content: Grrr need to learn how to tag folk I am having a bath, it's bliss. I will never taken anything as a given again, I thought I never did but this has shook me to the core. I am working less and giving more, I will never waste time again, I'm so greatful of this chance xxx

Posts.Content: Omg I feel almost embarrassed ....I am usually so together, seeing it written down is hideous.THNAK YOU SO MUCH. When I get through this and on my journey I am going to try to help as many people in the que behind me as possible,you lot are fantastic, I can't tell you what a comfort it is to be able to talk here xxxxxx
Posts.Title: A million questions and worries.....anxiety attack ?

Posts.Content: Dream their thank you, God you lot are amazing really, so reassuring xxxx
Posts.Title: A million questions and worries.....anxiety attack ?

Posts.Content: Oh crap I haven't put the pic up its a letter "breast screenings and mammograms showed a 15mm speculate mass in the upper inner quadrant of the left breast 101mm from the nipple.suspect of malignancy m5 WHAT DOES THAT MEAN consultant radiographer assessed on 15/11 on ultrasound this corresponded with a 5mm ill defined mass u5 (WHATS THAT clinical examination and ultrasound of axilla were unremarkable (a1 p1)IS THAT GOOD ultrasound guided core biopsy and clip placed at biopsy site left breast was taken. this shows invasive Ductal carcinoma B5b WHATS THAT MEAN PROVISIONAL grade 1  oestrogen receptor 8/8 WHAT DOES THAT MEAN HER2 to follow I THINK THATS ABOUT CHEMO I wish they would simplfy it so I could understand I'm having a mini meltdown today
Posts.Title: A million questions and worries.....anxiety attack ?

Posts.Content: Jojo I'm glad you called I have kept you in my thoughts x
Posts.Title: A million questions and worries.....anxiety attack ?

Posts.Content: Omg I just picked my daughter up from work as she has her driving test today We had a little walk to the local shop and I had what I think was anxiety on the way back I am asthmatic but well controlled I got my dx on Tuesday  Daughter is going for tonsils out tomorrow I told her Tuesday and son Wednesday Anyway these are my major panics. 1. I am sure I can feel it growing and spreading 2.Absolutely everything in my neck back shoulders and arms hurts...is it normal 3.what if my daughters surgery goes wrong tomorrow 4.omg what if I die who will look after my kids there dad is an arse mid divorce with no contact My chest feels tight, I feel exhausted even though I haven't even started treatment yet so no reson why I should feel any different Omg I am so bloody scared and feel like I have to hold it together for everyone, here is the only place I can say these words. God I feel like such a wus I have read some of your scary terrifying inspirational amazing stories and just think Christ I can't do this... I am a together person a doer fixer problem solver....I'm falling apart inside,is this normal, it's like waves of sickened washing over me I feel like I am losing all control of life and can't function on the most basic level. My left arm is all achy I am sure it's growing by the Second,I feel like I'm going mad
Posts.Title: A million questions and worries.....anxiety attack ?

Posts.Content: See Julia why didn't I think of that x
Posts.Title: A million questions and worries.....anxiety attack ?

Posts.Content: Thanks Helen xxx I think your absolutely right, normal service has resumed after a mini meltdown and a call to the helpline, what a bloody amazing support x
Posts.Title: A million questions and worries.....anxiety attack ?

Posts.Content: Crystaljuju I also get you too, I don't have a major bucket list but I am so bloody glad of a second chance x
Posts.Title: Am I missing something???

Posts.Content: Hi London, I haven't read all the replies, I have had some mega dark days here, as you well know, but I have a good plan and this week has been party time, out with friends work mates family etc, although everyone seems to think I should be at home with a blanket and cocoa  I don't start radiotherapy til new yr so for me this Christmas is all about having fun and enjoying myself with my kids and friends..... I think you have a brilliant attitude I did a big presentation at work, all very professional, however at the end I spoke about my cancer, told them I will not be wrapped in cotton wool and until I said differently thinks would be business as usual.... I think it sometimes sits better with us than other, I bloody hate the head tilting and pat on the hand, I know it's well meaning but it's not necessary You go and enjoy life. Hark at me all doom and gloom one minute and cloud nine the next. It's a strange ride but your on the up xxx
Posts.Title: Am I missing something???

Posts.Content: Yesterday I went to a living after cancer day it was ridiculously emotional but I found it very helpful,it was very sad as all the woman in the room bar one were relatively young which was very hard to think about.i would definitely recoemend them though. I also went on a look good feel good course which was great, learnt lots and fab freebies. Next week I am starting a course of massage with cancer care to help me sleep better  Today I have been to my oncologist she was very patient with my ridiculously long list of questions  sorted bloods to confirm where I am on menopause and requested an ultrasound to put my mind at rest that it was gone ❤ answered all my questions and advised don't cut out dairy said tamoxifen only reduces my risk slightly so might only take it for five years as after five risk of womb cancer increase but is still very very low risk so I need to believe all that and keep everything crossed that this is a start of a new life. So bloods Monday then again in six weeks then ultrasound , bit of an m.o.t. see surgeon again in next few weeks for a follow up. I am now back full time at work instead of working at home,there is light at the end of the tunnel and I am feeling like my old self. Cancer is really really shit and I am one of the lucky ones,I just wanted to share really that it does come to an end xxx
Posts.Title: Appointments and courses x

Posts.Content: What a fantastic post, I am just starting out and this has made my day ❤️❤️❤️
Posts.Title: Thank you ALL

Posts.Content: Cardbond the wait is the absolute pits, I was distraught, once you get your plan you kind of settle into battle xx
Posts.Title: Tiredness and aches.....

Posts.Content: I don't have any answers JAN but I was in hossi with infection at Christmas too, I hated being around sick peole as I though I would catch more. i would think if it's just a lingering cough which I know can be exhausting she would still be able to carry on, her oncologist will obviously advise, I hope she's better soon x
Posts.Title: Currently in hospital

Posts.Content: awww jojo I to.d my 15 yr old last night, he was a bit fed up to be last to be to.d but handled it with far more maturity than I gave him credit for. i had messaged a few teachers at school, I know them anyway and messaged friends mums to be on stand by,once I had told him I gave them all the nod, the mums told their sons and when he went to school today the support was ready. he had a cry and a talk to his mates and came home telling me all about it, we have touched on it briefly tonight but also just done normal stuff. me nagging him to revise him wanting to watch tv etc...... the advice I got and took was to be honest with them and not hide things, with my hbbie leaving this year and telling whopping lies I thought they deserved the truth we will face it together, I hope your sons ok xxx
Posts.Title: Children

Posts.Content: Merry Christmas x
Posts.Title: Xmas

Posts.Content: Oh heck, can you take 2x 10 til they get it right
Posts.Title: Pharmacy, Gp and Tamoxifen

Posts.Content: Hi i have same dx but lumpectomy, just finishing rads next week. i have massive worries which if I let them would consume me so I must not let  have done everything to stop this cancer and we are lucky to be grade one stage one, no nodes, there's no reason to think this is cancer other than the worms we let in out heads. have you tried any therapies? Massage etc? Is it constant pain?  We will never be the same again but we must move forward and not waste energy with worries all the time, it's still very early for us, if you look at things like predict with our dx we have a very good chances.xxxx dont get me wrong, by tomorrow this could be me having this worry, my name says it all x
Posts.Title: tension aches and pains

Posts.Content: I would be up for that xxx
Posts.Title: Two thanks and a Wish...

Posts.Content: London lass I love this especially today My thanks are To all the people in life and on line who have treat me, picked me up, held my hand and walked with me through the shower of shit that was 2016 My second thanks is for getting a second chance at life, I will not waste a minute My wish is that we all find our way to the other side and that one day all cancers will be treatable. I want to have the strength and grace to hold others hands as they walk behind in front or side by side with me xxxx
Posts.Title: Two thanks and a Wish...

Posts.Content: It definitely should be that ❤️
Posts.Title: Two thanks and a Wish...

Posts.Content: I feel your pain and anger, yesterday was my first day after finishing treatment, a local lady crossed the road, Her... oh how are you Me...im good thnks Her...oh what a shock Me...yes Her...so when do you get checked again Me...mamagram in novemver Her...oh hell thats ages it could be back by then or have spread elsewhere,my friend died when her bowel cancer spread me....well the docs got clear marginns and I have to trust the treatment.....in my head (WHY DONT YOU JUST FU(£ OFF YOU INSENSITIVE COW) it really is unbelievable how stupid some people can be xxxxxx

Posts.Content: hi i am sorry I have another question well more than one i started it on new yrs day so far all is fine but I read people getting offered different tablets, i am just turned 48 I haven't had a period for about 8 months is tamoxifen the right tablet? also I have had a dull tummy ache in my u per tummy last couple of days, do you think that's something completely different?  I have had a few nights when I wake up warm but that's about it. im not really sure what a hot flush is even, I assume at 13 days it will be in my system? im finding all the info so bloomin confusing
Posts.Title: Another tamoxifen question.....sake

Posts.Content: Hi I used r1/2 on weekends I used just r2  I used it four times a day during radio, I am ten days post now and still using r2 twice a day. No burns at all so I am happy with that, nipple is sensitive though. I don't know about any pad sorry, I wasn't covered with anything x

Posts.Title: Does a change in brand of tamoxifen make any difference please?

Posts.Content: Thanks for all the tips, day one done, I put r1 on straight after, had lose top on not to sticky at all, I put r2 on about three hrs later when I finally got home, I have put aloe Vera on too, going to do r2 again after tea before bed and first thing. i also have e45 intense recovery, leaving here at ten am tomorrow, will moisturise at about 7 app is 11.30 thanks for the tips

Fore journey and r2 straight after? or take them both with me?  Jist hoping to get started
